text: Craig Gruber (June 22, 1951 - May 5, 2015) was an American rock bassist and musician. He was best known as the original bassist in the English band Rainbow. He also played in Elf with vocalist Ronnie James Dio, keyboardist Mickey Lee Soule, drummer Gary Driscoll and guitarist David Feinstein. Gruber died from prostate cancer on May 5, 2015 in Florida, aged 63. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American bass guitarists Category:American rock musicians Category:Cancer deaths in Florida Category:Deaths from prostate cancer
title: Craig Gruber
